mapper.sql: ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into sys_param (ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,

mapper.update:
update sys_param
PARAM_NAME = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM_DESC = #{paramDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_param set PARAM_NAME = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_DESC = #{paramDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from sys_param where 1=1
PARAM_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{paramName}),'%')
